hero.title: GYM 147
hero.subtitle: Smart gym management system with advanced IoT technology

about.title: ABOUT GYM 147
about.description1: GYM 147 is a smart gym management system built with the goal of bringing the most modern and effective training experience to members. We combine advanced IoT technology with smart management solutions to optimize every aspect of training.
about.description2: With a professional and experienced team, GYM 147 is committed to providing high-quality services, ensuring safety and effectiveness for all members. We are not just an ordinary gym, but a comprehensive training ecosystem.
about.description3: From tracking training performance to managing schedules and payments, everything is automated and optimized to bring you the best experience.
about.mission: To bring the smartest, most modern and effective training solutions, helping everyone achieve their health and fitness goals.

technology.title: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY
technology.iotDesc: Connect and monitor smart training equipment
technology.aiDesc: Personalized training guidance with artificial intelligence
technology.dataDesc: Track and analyze detailed training performance
technology.securityDesc: Multi-layer security system with RFID and facial recognition

services.aiDetails: Analyze personal training data and provide optimal training programs based on your goals and physical condition.
